original_text: The Lord was very angry with the Israelites and he punished them. He sent robbers to attack them and take their animals and their food. He put them under the power of their enemies who lived around them. They were not strong enough to fight against their enemies.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하사 노략하는 자의 손에 넘겨 주사 그들이 노략을 당하게 하시며 또 주위에 있는 모든 대적의 손에 팔아 넘기시매 그들이 다시는 대적을 당하지 못하였으며

sentences.original_text: The Lord was very angry with the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 이스라엘 사람들에게 매우 화가 나셨다

sentences.original_text: He sent robbers to attack them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 공격하기 위해 강도들을 보냈다

sentences.original_text: and take their animals and their food
He put them under the power of their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 그들의 적들의 권세 아래 두셨다
